Headlines

Every Page requires a <h1> containing the page title, and <h2> for each section, <h3> for ech sub-section, and so on.

My Page contains two consecutive topics, and the user will navigate to the first, then the second

You require a 1-column layout with <h1> Page Title and <h2> Section titles

My Page contains two different topics, and the user navigates to either one or the other

You require a 2-column layout without <h1> but two <h2> section titles
